Display positions of detected peptides, PSMs, variants, etc.

  • uniprot

    required

    UniProt ID

  • dataset

    required

    Dataset ID

<togostanza-protein_browser_covid19 dataset='PXD019645-5'uniprot='P0DTC1'></togostanza-protein_browser_covid19>

The above element will automatically embed the following Stanza in your HTML page.
